name: Florence Road
description:
'''Florence Road''' is an Irish [[rock music|rock]] band formed in [[Bray, County Wicklow]] in 2019. The group consists of Lily Aron, Emma Brandon, Ailbhe Barry, and Hannah Kelly. They gained recognition in 2025 following the release of their single, "Heavy". The band signed to [[Warner Records]] and [[Warner Chappell Music]].

Although their debut single "Another Seventeen", released in 2022, was their first intro into the music world, this track eventually became a hit on TikTok.
